A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILERS. Was sad that they ruined Luke's cannon. Loved how the ship can stay just far away enough to avoid main weaponry but their pursuers can't get just a little closer. Lack of explanation on Snoke (and possibly Rey) was frustrating. Was annoyed they killed off admeral akbahr so casually. Same with Captian Phasma. Same with Snoke. Same with all of the Snoke disciples.
